body_html:
@ezyang Thanks for catching the error in the gradient clipping code in the Pytorch version -- turns out that was the culprit. Seems like I should have gone to the forums first...

On the other hand, this is very good news, because I can switch to Pytorch without concerns.

On the other hand, this is very good news, because I can switch to Pytorch without concerns.
